description: Architecture and art produced in an unmodified street of 56 houses, railway arch studios, and private galleries between 1974 and 2022. Beck Rd is an iconic artist haven and its residents key contributors to UK art history.

factsheet.heading: Beck Road
paragraphs: Beyond Beck Road is a community arts event. This event follows on from our previous event, By Beck Road 19, in 2019.  It is an opportunity to bring together a mixed community and showcase to the local and wider community the far-ranging creative work in Beck Road and beyond.

Beck Road is an unusually mixed area of renters, social housing, homeowners and artist studios who are passionate about the streets heritage and maintaining it and the community that sustains it.  This event provides an opportunity to present broad practice, involving a wide community that represents the diversity of the area coming together and provides a platform for artistic participation.

The exhibition will occur in residential spaces, a corner bar, railway arch studios, under a bridge and on Beck Roadâ€™s pavements, house facades and windows. It will include paintings, sculpture, film, installation and performance.
Beyond Beck Road - Raising a communal stage of common ground for an extended community!

factsheet.heading: History of the street
paragraphs: Beck Road is a street with a history in its present form since 1890.  The 56 houses and their residents were first recorded in the 1901 census. In the 1970s artists came to live and work among people born there. In the 1980s they began exhibiting individually at home and collaborated several times to present Open Studios with up to 16 artists showing in studios at the same time. An artist-run space has exhibited for the last 6 years.

factsheet.heading: Participating Artists
paragraphs: Beyond Beck Road will showcase the work of individual and collective artists connected to the street and its environs. A public exhibition space with residents opening their houses and studios and using the street as a stage for live events.

travel_info: Train: Cambridge Heath, London Fields, Hackney Central

name: Beyond Beck Road
